Entries.George: {{Random: It's awful cold, isn't it? What a rotten day. ++ Why do I even bother getting out of bed when the day looks like this? ++ My hip aches.|inputSeparator=++}}

Entries.movieTheater: Oh, @, we have a movie theater again!$h#$e#Think I'll take Evelyn, we used to go to the movies every Friday night.
Entries.winter_7{{YearRemainder}}: Everyone expects me to be cherry for the Festival. Hrmph.
